Recipe.title: Banana Boats
Recipe.Description:
When camping, you almost always have a campfire at night. And what is better than having a treat just before bedtime?
This is a recipe that leverages the coles from a campfire.

section.instruction: Build a campfire that will have lots of coles.
Hold the Banana flat and slice it half way deep, from end to end, making sure to not cut through bottom peel.
Position the Banana in the middle of a sheet of tin foil that is big enough to wrap all the way around the Banana. (about 12&inches; &by; 18&inches;)
Gently open the slice on the Banana and fill it with a mixture of the Miniture Marshmallows and Chocolate Chips.
Wrap the tin foil around the Banana, making sure that none of it is exposed at all.
When the campfire coles are ready, place the Banana Boat half-way deep in them, positioned with the fillings on the top.
Wait until the Miniture Marshmallows and Chocolate Chips have melted. (about 5-10 minutes)
Carefully (so you don't get burned) remove the Banana Boat from the campfire coles, and gently open the foil so the contents are fully exposed.

Notes.note: The Ingredient amounts are for a single Banana Boat. But you'll definately want to do more, so just get enough Bananas for everybody, and whole bags of toppings.&smiley;

Modifications.modification:
Add other ingredients, such as:
Spices such as Sugar and Cinnamon
Fruit such as Strawberries, Raspberries, etc.
Candy, such as M&Ms, broken up Peanut Butter Cups, pieces of Twix, etc.
Graham Cracker pieces
Cold Cereal such as Cinnamon Toast Crunch, etc.
Nuts (sliced or crushed)
